page.title: 17RECREATION.
page.content: {Village Hall.}Most entertainments are held here. These include Bingo, Whist Drives,Barbaques,Fashion Shows, Coffee Evenings, Supper Dances, Discos, Childrens Parties, Clay Pigeon Shoots, Barn Dances, Jumble Sales, Harvest Supper Parties and Film Shows. {Outdoor Activites:}These include Riding for the Diabled, Gymkhanas, Rounders and Cricket Matches, Bonfire Parties, Treasure Hunts, Mini-Craft Shows and Village Outings. {Events in Private Homes.}Coffee Evenings, Auctions, Cheese and Wine Parties.Also Commercial Party Plan Parties. Most of these functions are organised to raise funds for Village Hall Maintenance, by local clubs for their running expenses and in aid of local and National Charities.
